import React from "react" import Header from "../../components/header/Header" import "./Projects.css" import Filtration from "./Filtration" import projectData from "./projectData" function Projects(props) { const theme = props.theme const [data, setData] = useState([ { id: 1, title: "Project 1", description: "Description for project 1", technologies: ["React", "CSS"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Frontend", }, { id: 2, title: "Project 2", description: "Description for project 2", technologies: ["React Native", "Node.js"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Mobile Apps", }, { id: 3, title: "Project 3", description: "Description for project 3", technologies: ["Wordpress", "PHP"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Wordpress", }, { id: 4, title: "Project 4", description: "Description for project 4", technologies: ["React", "Node.js"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Frontend", }, { id: 5, title: "Project 5", description: "Description for project 5", technologies: ["React Native", "Node.js"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Mobile Apps", }, { id: 6, title: "Project 6", description: "Description for project 6", technologies: ["Wordpress", "PHP"], githubLink: "https://github.com", demoLink: "https://demo.com", label: "Wordpress", }, ]) const [activeLabel, setActiveLabel] = useState("All") const [projectLabels, setProjectLabels] = useState({ All: data.map((project) => project.id), Frontend: [1, 4], MobileApps: [2, 5], Wordpress: [3, 6], }) const handleLabelClick = (label) => { setActiveLabel(label) } const filteredProjects = activeLabel === "All" ? data : data.filter((project) => projectLabels[activeLabel].includes(project.id) ) return (
{filteredProjects.map((project) => ( ))}
More Projects (Github)
) } export default Projects
